sqlMap.select: SELECT A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NM FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE (YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID) IN (SELECT YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE (METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR) IN (SELECT METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND METRIC_ID = #findMetricId#) AND DELETE_DT IS NULL)

SELECT A.ITEM_CD, B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM FROM BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM A , BSC_CAL_TYPE_COL B WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND B.METRIC_ID = #findMetricId# AND B.INSERT_GUBUN = '01' ORDER BY B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM
SELECT DEPT_ID FROM ( SELECT DEPT_ID FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND SC_DEPT_ID = #findScDeptCd# ORDER BY DEPT_ID ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT '1425' DEPT_ID , C.DEPT_NM , A.YEAR , A.MON , A.GID , A.FLAG_CODE , A.ISVISB , A.LEVEL1 , A.LEVEL2 , A.LEVEL3 , A.LEVEL4 , A.AUTH_USERID , A.AUTH_NAME , A.AUTH_DISP , A.RGST_USERID , A.RGST_NAME , A.RGST_DATE A_DATE , A.QSTN_USERID , A.STEP , A.KM_ITEMID , A.ITEMID , A.KMID , A.POS , A.TITLE , A.READ_CNT , A.RCMD_CNT , A.RPLY_CNT , A.STATUS , A.PID , A.RFRN_CNT , A.ANSW_RATE , B.RGST_DATE Q_DATE , ( TO_DATE (A.RGST_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD') - TO_DATE (B.RGST_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD') + 1) - (SELECT COUNT (1) FROM SAORA01.GGA0500M WHERE HODY_YN = 'T' AND YMD_CHAR BETWEEN TO_CHAR (B.RGST_DATE , 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR ( A.RGST_DATE , 'YYYYMMDD')) PROC_DAYS FROM V_QNA_ITEM_001 A , (SELECT ITEMID , YEAR , MON , RGST_DATE FROM V_QNA_ITEM_001 WHERE POS = 0 AND STEP = 0 AND YEAR = #findYear# AND MON = #findMon#) B LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO C ON '1425' = C.DEPT_ID WHERE A.POS = 1 AND A.STEP = 1 AND A.PID = B.ITEMID AND (SELECT ( TO_DATE (A.RGST_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD') - TO_DATE (B.RGST_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD') + 1) - (SELECT COUNT (1) FROM SAORA01.GGA0500M WHERE HODY_YN = 'T' AND YMD_CHAR BETWEEN TO_CHAR (B.RGST_DATE , 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR ( A.RGST_DATE , 'YYYYMMDD')) FROM DUAL) <= 3

SELECT '1425' DEPT_ID , B.DEPT_NM , A.YEAR, A.MON, A.GID, A.FLAG_CODE, A.ISVISB , A.LEVEL1, A.LEVEL2, A.LEVEL3, A.LEVEL4 , A.AUTH_USERID, A.AUTH_NAME, A.AUTH_DISP , A.RGST_USERID, A.RGST_NAME, A.RGST_DATE Q_DATE , A.QSTN_USERID, A.STEP, A.KM_ITEMID , A.ITEMID, A.KMID, A.POS, A.TITLE , A.READ_CNT, A.RCMD_CNT, A.RPLY_CNT , A.STATUS, A.PID, A.RFRN_CNT , A.ANSW_RATE, C.RGST_DATE A_DATE , ( TO_DATE (C.RGST_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD') - TO_DATE (A.RGST_DATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD') + 1) - (SELECT COUNT (1) FROM SAORA01.GGA0500M WHERE HODY_YN = 'T' AND YMD_CHAR BETWEEN TO_CHAR (A.RGST_DATE , 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR ( C.RGST_DATE , 'YYYYMMDD')) PROC_DAYS FROM V_QNA_ITEM_001 A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON '1425' = B.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PID, YEAR, MON, RGST_DATE FROM V_QNA_ITEM_001 WHERE POS = 1 AND STEP = 1 ) C ON A.ITEMID = C.PID WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND MON = #findMon# AND POS = 0 AND STEP = 0
